definition: to have a heart-to-heart chat
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
surname Tan
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
to sit side-by-side and have a heart-to-heart talk (idiom)

sentences.english: ShangMingYang father came to visit troops, both father and son a heart-to-heart talk.
sentences.chinese: 汤名扬的爸爸来到部队探望儿子，父子二人促膝谈心。

sentences.english: Go talk to them and tell them how you feel.
sentences.chinese: 试着与他们谈谈心，告诉他们你的感受。

sentences.english: Talk to an older family member you have helped in the past.
sentences.chinese: 跟一直帮助你的长辈谈谈心。

sentences.english: I always face those bastards, I can't make friends with them.
sentences.chinese: 整天面对那些臭男人，没有一个可以谈心的。

sentences.english: Boyfriend and girlfriend after breaking up, turned heart-to-heart talk's good friend.
sentences.chinese: 男女朋友分手之后，变成了谈心的好朋友。

sentences.english: JiangYuHe plucked at her hand, ask her to stay commune.
sentences.chinese: 姜宇赫拽住她的手，请求她留下来谈心。

sentences.english: Heart-to-heart chats are conducive to the solution of ideological problems.
sentences.chinese: 谈心活动有助于思想问题的解决。

sentences.english: For some people, it can help to talk about the loss with others.
sentences.chinese: 对有些人来说，和别人谈谈心会有助于自身的恢复。

sentences.english: I got knee to knee with him.
Kate told me her mind without reserve.
sentences.chinese: 凯特毫无保留地和我谈心。

sentences.english: Father is always very busy, seldom take out time to come out to be like to sit down to discuss heart now.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸一向很忙，难得抽时间出来像现在坐下来谈谈心。

sentences.english: Come and sit with me here on the sledge and I will put my mantle round you and we will talk.
sentences.chinese: 坐到我雪橇上来吧，我给你裹上披风，好一起谈谈心。

sentences.english: Now that everyone else has gone, both of us can have a heart-to-heart talk.
sentences.chinese: 既然别人都走了，我们俩人可以促膝谈心。

sentences.english: Prayer is simply you having a conversation with Me.
sentences.chinese: 祷告其实很简单，就是你我之间的谈心。

sentences.english: I didn't understand my mother's love to me until I talked with her yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 直到昨天和妈妈谈心我才理解妈妈对我的爱。

definition: to chat/to gossip
to sit side-by-side and have a heart-to-heart talk (idiom)
to chat
to give one's bare heart into sb else's keeping (idiom); sb has one's absolute confidence/to trust completely/to confide in sb with entire sincerity
to talk endlessly/talking of anything under the sun
to talk (with sb)/to have a conversation/talk/conversation/CL:次[ci4]
to say everything (that is on one's mind)
to discuss/to converse/chat/discussion
to chat/casual conversation
a long talk
to chat about domestic trivia (idiom)
to talk or chat about ordinary daily life
not to hold anything back (idiom)/(of close friends etc) to tell each other everything
to confide in each other (idiom)
to talk sb round/to straighten sth out/to enlighten
erhua variant of 聊天[liao2 tian1]
